qas.question: What does the Supervisory Board discuss at it's meetings?

answers.text: discuss, plan and carry out the ECB’s supervisory tasks

qas.question: How long is the term for the Chairman of the Supervisory Board?

answers.text: appointed for a non-renewable term of five years

qas.question: How long is the term for Vice-Chair of the Supervisory Board?

answers.text: chosen from among the members of the ECB's Executive Board

qas.question: Besides the Chair and Vice-Chair, who else is on the Supervisory Board?

answers.text: four ECB representatives and representatives of national supervisors

qas.question: What happens if the national supervisory authority designated by a Member State is not a national central bank?

answers.text: the representative of the competent authority can be accompanied by a representative from their NCB

plausible_answers.text: discuss, plan and carry out the ECB’s supervisory tasks

qas.question: What does the Supervisory Board avoid doing at it's meetings?
How long is the prison term for the Chairman of the Supervisory Board?

plausible_answers.text: chosen from among the members of the ECB's Executive Board

qas.question: How long is the culinary term for Vice-Chair of the Supervisory Board?

plausible_answers.text: four ECB representatives and representatives of national supervisors

qas.question: Who is restricted from being on the supervisory board?

plausible_answers.text: the representative of the competent authority can be accompanied by a representative from their NCB

qas.question: What happens if the national supervisory authority designated by a Member State is not a local bank?

context: The Supervisory Board meets twice a month to <a0_0><b5_0>discuss, plan and carry out the ECB’s supervisory tasks<b5_0/><a0_0/>. It proposes draft decisions to the Governing Council under the non-objection procedure. It is composed of Chair (<a1_0>appointed for a non-renewable term of <b6_0>five years<b6_0/><a1_0/>), Vice-Chair (<a2_0><b7_0>chosen from among the members of the ECB's Executive Board<b7_0/><a2_0/>) <a3_0><b8_0>four ECB representatives and representatives of national supervisors<b8_0/><a3_0/>. If the national supervisory authority designated by a Member State is not a national central bank (NCB), <a4_0><b9_0>the representative of the competent authority can be accompanied by a representative from their NCB<b9_0/><a4_0/>. In such cases, the representatives are together considered as one member for the purposes of the voting procedure.
